justification: “Weight of Advice (WoA) is measured by how much the advisee's estimate shifts towards the advice given, proportionally to the difference between their original belief and the advice.”

measured_by: Deviation between observed and optimal WoA
justification: “The observed WOA consistently falls short of the optimal WOA… This reflects a bias where participants are inclined to favor their estimates over those of the advisor.”

measured_by: Preference probability for View B over View A
justification: “To quantify the relative preference of View B over View A, we calculate the preference probability for View B… This metric helps us understand how likely participants are to prefer View B over View A.”
